boardgame.name: Dragon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Hoard
Von Drachen und Schafen
boardgame.description: In Dragon's Hoard, each player plays a dragon hunting for treasure. Collect sheep from the farmer's fields and use them to buy treasures, but watch out! Other players will send angry mobs and wizards your way to stop you. Defend yourself and battle your way to riches._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In game terms, players draft cards from a common draw pile before taking their actions. You want to buy as many treasures as you can. Dragons buy treasures with sheep that they've collected, while opponents will play terrible actions against you to keep you from tendering those sheep. Battle to keep your treasure, while trying to stop your opponents from doing the same._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the game, the player with the most victory points from treasures and bonuses wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: The Dwarf (fan expansion to Dragon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Hoard)
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Low Player Count - Ep 11 - High Player Count for Two

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

International shipping rates (DHL, all prices in Euro): Letter (up to 0,5 kg): 3,45 € worldwide Letter (up to 1,0 kg): 7,00 € worldwide Letter (up to 2,0 kg): 17,00 € worldwide +++ inscribed letter: add 2,05 € = insured till 20,00 € or insribed letter: add 3,85 € = insured till 25,00 or extra insurence: add 1,50 € für every 100,00 € insurance. Small Parcel (up to 2,0 kg): 8,90 € (EU) or 15,90 € (worldwide) +++ no full insurence possible (only up to 35 Euro for additional 2,00 €) Parcel (up to 5,0 kg): 16,99 € (EU) or 29,99 € (Rest of Europe) or 35,99 € (USA/CAN) oder 42,99 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 10,0 kg): 21,99 € (EU) or 34,99 € (Rest of Europe) or 47,99 € (USA/CAN) oder 59,99 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 20,0 kg): 31,99 € (EU) or 49,99 € (Rest of Europe) or 68,99 € (USA/CAN) oder 92,99 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 31,5 kg): 41,99 € (EU) or 54,99 € (Rest of Europe) or 93,99 € (USA/CAN) oder 124,99 € (Rest of World) Insured till 500,00 € only in EU +++ add 8,50 € for insurance (Rest of Europe) or 18 € (USA/CAN) or 24 € (Rest of World) Shipping in Germany (DHL, all prices in Euro): Brief (up to 0,05 kg): 0,90 € Großbrief (up to 0,5 kg): 1,45 € Warensendung (up to 0,5 kg): 1,90 € Maxibrief (up to 1,0 kg): 2,40 € Maxibrief (up to 2,0 kg): 4,60 € +++ inscribed letter: add 2,05 € = insured till 20,00 € or insribed letter: add 3,85 € = insured till 25,00 or extra insurence: add 1,50 € für every 100,00 € insurance. Päckchen (up to 2,0 kg): 4,10 € +++ no insurence possible Paket (up to 2,0 kg): 4,90 € Paket (up to 10,0 kg): 6,99 € Paket (up to 20,0 kg): 11,99 € Paket (up to 31,5 kg): 13,99 € Insured till 500,00 € NO ADDITIONAL FEES FOR PACKAGE! *** Payment: Within Euro-zone the EU-standard-bank-transfer (SEPA, IBAN/BIC) is recommended, it´s quick, save and causes no fees. Paypal is certainly also possible, fees within EU are 0,35 Euro + 1,9% of the total. Worldwide (outside the EURO-zone) Paypal is recommended. Paypal -fees are 0,35 Euro + (3,9% - 5,2%) of the total. For nearly all countries outside Europe, apart from USA and Canada (both 3,9%), the rate is 5.2%. The fees of the payment method you choose and the real shipping costs you have to pay. Thank you. Stephan.
